DOC.brief_summary: The objective study determine whether use botulinum toxin ( Dysport ® ) conjunction hyaluronic acid filler ( Restylane® ) improve appearance wrinkle forehead glabella ( area eyebrows ) well botulinum toxin alone . These two product FDA approve improve appearance facial wrinkle .
DOC.brief_title: Treatment Forehead/Glabellar Rhytide Complex With Combination Botulinum Toxin A Hyaluronic Acid Versus Botulinum Toxin A Injection Alone
